comment.readme: This is master file and can be overridden by Repository Specific File
comment.pullRequests: Do we need to push Pull Requests details to Rally , Options : yes/no
comment.commits: Do we need to push Commits details to Rally , Options : yes/no
comment.updateArtifactStatus: Do we need to Update Artifact Status onto Rally , Options : yes/no

includes: Prefixes or complete name of branches which we intend to be part of this integration
excludes: Prefixes or complete name of branches which we intend not to be part of this integration

status: Available State Values as per Rally Project
